summary: Apply a process to each pixel
description: Applies a process to each pixel value in the data cube (i.e. a local operation). In contrast, the process ``apply_dimension()`` applies a process to all pixel values along a particular dimension.

parameters.name: process
parameters.description: A process that accepts and returns a single value and is applied on each individual value in the data cube. The process may consist of multiple sub-processes and could, for example, consist of processes such as ``abs()`` or ``linear_scale_range()``.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Additional data passed by the user.

returns.description: The value to be set in the new data cube.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Additional data to be passed to the process.

returns.description: A data cube with the newly computed values and the same dimensions. The dimension properties (name, type, labels, reference system and resolution) remain unchanged.
